contest-event.event-date:
May 29, 1944 D Cardiff March Contest
Cardiff March Contest 0 March Contest
cardiff-march-contest
None
Roath Park, Cardiff Deportment 1st Melingriffith, 2nd Parc and Dare. This should have been an own choice contest but was reduced to a march contest owing to the weather. Prizes - 1st £35, 2nd £25, 3rd £18. 3 bands competed.
March 2, 2013, 11:06 a.m. Feb. 1, 2019, 2:03 p.m.
1 Parc and Dare Band W. Haydn Bebb
2 City of Cardiff (Melingriffith) Band Thomas James Powell
3 Cory Band Unknown
